communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All policies, procedures, memos, or guidelines governing access to Flock Safety ALPR data, including who has access (e.g., all officers, detectives only, supervisors only, or external parties) (names not requested).  

Records detailing how access to the Flock Safety system is logged, monitored, and audited, including any software or protocols used for tracking user activity.  

Locations of Flock cameras that your department/agency maintains. 

Information on whether searches or queries of Flock Safety data are periodically reviewed, by whom (e.g., internal affairs, command staff, or external auditors), and the frequency and criteria for such reviews.  

Any agreements, contracts, or communications regarding the sharing of Flock Safety data with national systems, federal agencies, or other law enforcement entities outside Genesee County.  

Documentation on whether Flock Safety data is integrated or merged with Palantir systems, such as their Gotham software, including any technical specifications, contracts, or integration reports.  

Records indicating if Flock Safety data is sold, licensed, shared for commercial purposes, or otherwise provided to any third parties, including private companies, insurers, or non-law enforcement entities.  

Aggregate statistics on the number of searches conducted in the Flock Safety system over the past 3 months, broken down by user role or search category, if available.  

Any audit reports, logs, or summaries related to Flock Safety data access from April 1, 2025 through June 30, 2025

If these records are maintained by Flock Safety or another vendor, please provide any relevant contracts addressing data ownership, access, and disclosure requirements.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jeff Lane
